description: This file is a React functional component named TopBar, which renders a top navigation bar for a game called Link Loop. It displays the game timer, move count, and action buttons such as Undo, Reset, and optionally a Leaderboard button.

methods.name: TopBar({ seconds, onUndo, onReset, movesCount, showLeaderboard, onLeaderboardClick })
methods.description: React functional component that displays game timer, move counter, and action buttons.

ctags.signature: ({ seconds, onUndo, onReset, movesCount, showLeaderboard, onLeaderboardClick })
